text:
:orange_heart:*Please take a moment to review our Code of Conduct*:orange_heart:

We want the HubSpot Developer community to be inclusive and welcoming. By following our Code of Conduct, you can help ensure that's the case.

TL;DR:
• Be respectful
• Be inclusive (try not to say, "Hey guys, hey boys, hey [any specific group]")
• No self promotion, except for <#C0121KGC6RM|showcase> and <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> 
• No unsolicited DMs
Read the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct|whole thing here> - and thanks for being a part of the HubSpot Developer Community!

Want to report a violation? DM <@UQNEXHW14> or fill out the <https://form.asana.com/?k=p7aM0fpd3G4JGETDL_nYXg&d=8587152060687|anonymous form here>.

Unsure where to put this, but does anyone know of a way to remove the black background from a video thumbnail? I have a client that wants to use transparent video thumbnails, but the embed iframe has a `body{background:#000}` line in the css. ironically, it goes to transparent when the video starts playing when i no longer need it transparent! i've tried using jquery to change it but i'm getting a cross-origin error. I think my only way out is a HubSpot dev updating the CSS on their side.
Is this a HubSpot Video?
i think you can change the thumbnail for it
yes. you can change the thumbnail, but the iframe background color is set to black. so using a transparent image as a thumbnail, which they want, is impossible due to the hs embed.
hi! anyone doing consulting? we’re looking for someone to review our setup + workflows
You could either choose one of the integration from the marketplace or use a google sheet like a bridge to send data to mysql

You only need to include the first <script> only once, try to remove the second `<script charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" src="<http://js.hsforms.net/forms/embed/v2.js|js.hsforms.net/forms/embed/v2.js>"></script>`

Hi guys, wondering if it's possible to add an action to the Contact view somewhere? We're using HubSpot as the source of truth, but sometimes we want to lookup the current contact in a different internal system, much like the existing "Search in Google"

-but we'd like to add some other specialized search, like <https://ourserver/mail?contact.email.com> for example
doesn't have to be in the Actions menu - we could also put it in a card or somewhere, as long as it's easy for the users to "click to lookup" :slightly_smiling_face:

You could use the Knowledge Base tool included with Service Hub Pro to create articles. To lock it down like an intranet, you would need to set them up as private content that's list based for those who need access. If you need other intranet features beyond articles, then you would need to look at Memberships, but that starts with CMS Hub Enterprise.
Is there a way to re-order the hubdb rows in the dropdown select for the HubDB Row field within a module?

Hey - I am a freelance fullstack developer from Germany and I would suggest to built a custom crm card.
There you have the option to display an iFrame of your system, or if there is an api you can directly display possible matches of the other system directly in the detail view of HubSpot
Hi - Is there a way I can submit a HubSpot form after 5 seconds within a module, since it seems like anything I do to auto submit the form isn't working. Thank you
anyone know how to handle Microsoft MFA automatically logging all users out of HubSpot every 2 weeks without notification?

Thanks, Andrea. I am working on the private app api to collect data and write directly to Mysql.
Do you know if there is a way to grap all properties and their data? Thanks
2 weeks is pretty generous lol, pretty sure google kicks me out every hour :open_mouth:
is it not possible to preview a dynamic page without publishing it?

What is `Full name` under contact tokens? The deal that was created was called  `- New Deal` , I can’t find any reference to `Full name` in contact properties / settings and the contact enrolled in the automation was first name `Jacob` last name `Jennings` ?
Never mind, it was referring to the contact owner’s full name which seemed to always be blank…
:laughing:

Hi, Has anyone had problems with the drag and drop editor in that despite no elements being visible on top of my modules only the header can be selected ?  I want to select the modules that are visible. The header is position:fixed which may be affecting it.
